title: Teeny-Tiny and the Witch Woman (K)
brief_description: This Turkish folktale relates the adventures of Teeny Tiny and his two brothers. Lost in the forest, the three boys are welcomed by an ugly witch who appears to offer shelter. Only Teeny Tiny’s resourcefulness can save them from a dire fate. Based on the book by Barbara Walker.
